messages.message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
messages.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

messages.message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
messages.author: John Lennon

messages.message: Get busy living or get busy dying.
messages.author: Stephen King

messages.message: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
messages.author: Mae West

messages.message: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
messages.author: Thomas A. Edison

messages.message: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
messages.author: Albert Einstein

messages.message: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
messages.author: Steve Jobs

messages.message: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
messages.author: Seneca

messages.message: Cogito, ergo sum. (I think, therefore I am.)
messages.author: René Descartes

messages.message: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
messages.author: Marcus Aurelius

messages.message: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
messages.author: Lao Tzu

messages.message: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
messages.author: Sun Tzu

messages.message: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
messages.author: Mahatma Gandhi

messages.message: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
messages.author: Harry S. Truman

messages.message: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
messages.author: Scorates

messages.message: You have to create your own luck. You have to be aware of the opportunities around you and take advantage of them.
messages.author: Yuna Kim

messages.message: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
messages.author: Amelia Earhart

messages.message: Do not be afraid to dream big, even if others tell you it’s impossible.
messages.author: Colin Powell
